review_text: Great little place for a couple. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

I had a quick visit to Beaumont and Richard’s place was perfect. It was easy to find, access, and very peaceful. The cottage its self was just as described and pictured. I didn’t take advantage of the pool but it looked so refreshing and I hope to next time. I will definitely stay again when visiting the area. Try it for yourself, you won’t regret it.
Great experience
Great for our overnight stay. Didn't get to enjoy the pool due to the rainstorm, but it sure looked inviting. Richard was always quick to respond.
They responded to my inquiries immediately, they are good hosts and were helpful in everything :)
Very friendly host, beautiful outdoor area and very affordable. I would stay here again
Great place! And let us check in early when our schedule changed.

It was nice staying for 2 nights. Just the barking from the neighbors dog at nights and the rooster at 6am. From there, we didn't had any problems, mostly because we live on an area where there's no external noise and we definitely know it's not the hosters fault. We will probably reserve again if we need to.
It was a nice stay at beaumont
Nice place for a quick overnight stay. Everything was as described. Good communication with Richard. Convenient location to I-10

From booking the place to arriving at the apartment Richard made everything so easy! Provided all the necessary information for the stay way before I got there which made check in and check out seamless!
Beautiful neighborhood and and even more serene and tranquil backyard area where the apartment was.
Best place to stay in Beaumont!
Loved the cottage, history and pool!!
We only had a short time to stop over in Beaumont, but Richard’s place was a great fit for our needs. Richard was helpful and communicative, and the space was very comfortable.
Stay there two weeks a year for 4 or 5 years now, and as always, it is a very pleasant experience..
Lovely place and great location. Host provided us great recommendations.
The cottage was beautiful. The atmosphere felt great. The kitchen had everything I needed. I recommend this place to anyone.
Had a very short stay, but it was lovely while we were there!

This was my second time staying at the Cottage, and both times were great! The hosts are friendly and responsive. The place is comfortable, adorable, and clean. I will absolutely stay here again, if the chance arises. :)

Our hosts were amazing and thought of everything when stocking the place up. From the spices in the kitchen with even butter in the fridge to the earplugs just in case noise bothers you at night. They were very responsive and we’ve very appreciative of their hospitality!
The place was exactly what I needed for the 2 nights of rest I needed. Place was clean and very private. I definitely would recommend

Nice host, comfortable bed and extra pillows. Even had a book of recommendations of what to do around the neighborhood. I was there only for a night for a business trip but would definitely stay again. Host had plenty of apps to watch shows.

Richard's place was in the perfect spot for me and my husband. Less than 10 minutes from every activity we had planned in the area. So cozy. Had everything we needed. The only thing we didn't like was the weather not being warm enough to use the pool area! So we have to come back when it's warm for sure!

Absolutely gorgeous place, really homey
Loved the stay here
Honestly such a lovely place!!

Quaint, well appointed, and in a beautiful neighborhood. However, the windows were extremely dirty, in contrast to the rest of the garage apartment, which was extremely clean. Paint drops on the original hard wood floor (maybe from painting the beadboard ceiling) didn't give a good feeling of a well cared for accomodation.
Cozy and comfortable space in a beautiful historic neighborhood. Well stocked kitchen! We slept great and had tasty coffee in the morning.

We are local, but needed a place to stay for a few days during home repairs.
It was a quaint, peaceful garage apartment with a relaxing deck.
It's an older home but thoughtfully remodeled and presented with a nice bathroom and kitchen.
If you don't enjoy this place... well, maybe you're too picky.
Had a great stay. Perfect for what we needed.
Great location. Thank you for letting us stay. 🙂
Nice
We had a great stay! Super clean, warm and cozy. Safe neighborhood! Thank you!!

Overall, Richard's place was a safe stay for an evening. The PoolHouse is not level, though it felt like a very stable building.
Beautiful neighborhood, full of lots of historical homes, and southern charm.
The listing states the mattress is fairly new, however it was a rough night. I'd suggest one person sleep on the bed and one sleep on the couch- if you're traveling with 2 adults.
The place was in a safe location and gave us a place to stay for the evening.
A great economical stay, and a beautiful historic district… All the amenities needed with just the right amount of historical charm!
The place was comfortable and the pool was nice and clean. Spacious enough for three people with the pull out bed. Unfortunately the wifi didn’t work as advertised
Everything a quaint pool house should be! I feel very comfortable while staying during the week.
Great place to stay when I had some work in Beaumont. Would stay again!

I found this cute apartment to be as represented in the pictures and description. It's located in Beaumont's Historical Section among other lovely homes. It is clean and neat. The kitchen has most everything you might need including a variety of spices and condiments. What we loved the most was the availability of the outdoor space - the pool, floats, outdoor furniture. The local attractions listed on this rental included Tyrrell Park which we visited and enjoyed. We may not have found it otherwise. This apartment accommodate two people comfortably. It was perfect for us!
Nice people

Only had a short stay but would have loved a longer trip. Its has a beautiful view of the pool from the private deck. We enjoyed the history of the home and the beauty of the original hardwood floors. The place is perfect for a longer stay with all the included amenities. I'm a light sleeper so the neighbors dogs were a bit loud for me but the host mentioned that in their post and provided ear plugs if needed. My friend had no problem sleeping right through it. The neighborhood was quiet and great to take a stroll and see the historic homes. Richard was great host and provided great instructions before arriving. I will definitely like to book a longer stay in the future during a warmer season so I can enjoy the pool as well.
Lovely place and very nice, responsive hosts. I’ll definitely try to book again!
Thanks.!
One of my favorite place to stay in Beaumont. Always great!!

I absolutely loved my stay here. very cute and comfy ! i would recommend to anyone. friendliest people as host and was very understanding with our complicated schedule. very flexible and thoughtful. best experience at an airbnb so far!

The Pool Cottage is a beautiful place. The pool is insane. The hosts are very nice.
We felt comfortable and enjoyed our time.
We make a recommendation.
Great place to stay with a very responsive host. The space was clean and a good central spot for Beaumont. Definitely recommend.

Richard was accesible all the time.
We didn’t use he’s place , we had other things to do that day.
So I have nothing to say. Thanks Richard!
very charming cottage. the pool area was so nice. the host always answered all our questions. very helpful. great place to stay
Host always responds within a couple of minutes! Very flexible and accommodating. 😃
We had a nice stay. The place was clean and easy to get to our venue.
Stay was great as always!! Will def stay here again if ever in the Beaumont area again! Thank y’all so much for working with me and being such great host!!
Place is amazing as always! Staying another 2 nights!

This was our first stay in Beaumont, and we will definitely be back. This place will be our first choice when making reservations to return. I was emailed that morning with instructions on checking in. There’s an extremely helpful notebook in the room that contained any questions my husband and I may have had, so no need to bother the host, although I would have felt comfortable doing so. The place was exactly how it was described, was very clean, and close to restaurants. Awesome place to stay!
Richards place was a great & cozy, i felt right at home for the short amount of time i stayed, if ever is available when I’m in the area will def book again!!
The perfect place to stay. Had everything we need. Mr. Richard and his wife were great host.
Richard is a great host, I had no problems staying at this airbnb.

Its always a pleasure to stay at this cottage. Richard and his wife are excellent hosts and very pleasant and easy to communicate with. The place was very comfortable and clean like always. The pool is also very well maintained! I look forward to my next visit with them!

Easy to understand instructions and went above and beyond with the amenities.
Definitely coming back to stay again!
The pool was an added luxury!

The place was as it was described in the posting. Richard had excellent communication, check in with super easy, check out, was just as easy. Would recommend staying. Would stay again myself in the area.

WONDERFUL PLACE. Nice and private. Perfect for a solo trip. This is my second time staying with them and I’ve never even seen them. You’ve got the place all to yourself. They responded quickly every time thru the app.
I was in town for a training all week. The house was clean and had everything I needed, and getting to Lamar everyday was easy.
cute pool house
This is a well run, as advertised location. Definitely deserving of a 5-star rating.
A great place to stay. Sorry we could only stay one night.

We had a wonderful stay! Very hospitable owners, clean place, lots to do within a short distance!
I would absolutely stay here again!
Thank y'all!
Thank you so much for another great stay!

This was a great Airbnb to stay at that was all setup and ready upon arrival. The pool cottage was just as described in the pictures. The host was very attentive and quick to respond to any questions. Everything we needed was available. I enjoyed my stay and would highly recommend anyone looking for the just right place to try it out! Thanks again. Definitely a super host.

I had a quick overnight stay in Beaumont and felt very comfortable at Richard's place. I walked down the street to Rosie's and had the best meatloaf and lima beans with rice with cornbread for dinner. Checking in and out was very easy.
Clean and well maintained place. Great host.

Great overall place to stay!
Everything extremely clean and the pack and play was very convenient for our youngest baby!
We will definitely be back!
Pool was great! Bed is comfortable!
Great place, super clean and cozy. I love the decorations.
Came to take a board exam in Beaumont! Great one night stay. Clean, affordable. Would stay again!
My first time in Beaumont was pleasant. Amazing trees in the neighborhood! Lots of great spring birding in the area!
Friendly, clean and great place to stay at! Had to leave early but everything was great! Everything was within a 5-10 min drive! Got extra towels and blankets for the nights.
I have stayed at Richard’s numerous times and every time it has been a wonderful experience. He and his wife are such kind and wonderful people. I look forward to going back there again.

The accommodation was cozy, clean,practical, has comfortable sleeping options ,has a spacious terrace with (aged) garden furniture and a large (older)pool. We were able to use everything well even though we were only there for one night. We would definitely stay there again!

Richard was highly responsive and very helpful! While out-and -about most of the day, we enjoyed returning to Richard’s place for dinner and drinks on the tree-top level deck. The bed was comfortable and the kitchen had everything we needed.
Richard and his wife were great hosts, they very responsive to all my messages and the house was very clean and had lots of amenities. I would definitely stay here again!
It was very nice location and very clean and designer cute.
Great little suite above the garage by the pool. Perfect for my overnight stay. Met all my needs!

Richard and Delanea’s pool cottage was perfect. I come to Beaumont about once a year for business. This is my second time staying here. It is the perfect air BnB for so many reasons. It’s located in a beautiful neighborhood quite close to everything. Uber made it easy to get around. The cottage was charming and had all
the amenities I needed.
I highly recommend their place to anyone visiting Beaumont! -Mike
We were in town visiting family, this was only 10 mins away from them. Beautiful little area, with everything needed close by.
A really lovely apartment, exactly as described.

Highly recommend - especially to the eco-conscious traveler and anyone with chemical sensitivities. Easy to find; parking on premises felt extremely safe; the rooms are much bigger than expected. Good wifi. A fully equipped kitchen made it A++. Able to check in late with no issues. Its also quite charming.
It was a great place to stay!
I stayed for 5 weeks on a work trip. It was great - comfortable, well stocked kitchen, washer & dryer. Hosts were very accommodating. Thank you!
Really enjoyed our stay. Our hosts were very responsive to inquiries. Nice quiet neighborhood.
Have stayed here several times and have had no issues. Will stay here again
Close by hospital, established neighborhood. Perfect for what I needed
It’s always a great place to stay when I’m in Beaumont. I love this little house! Thank you again!

Very tidy and lovely AirBnb apartment equipped with everything you need. A good bed and nice bathroom. Richard is a great host and there when you need him, very nice and wants to share all he know about the area. We had a great stay!
Clean and comfortable
This is a wonderful place. The Pool looked awsome!! I wish it would of been a litter warmer to try it. Prefect place to stay. Response times our wonderful.
Easy check-in, comfortable furnishings, great location. This listing was perfect for a stopover in Beaumont. Would stay here again.
Comfortable and clean cottage that’s close to everything in the Beaumont area. Stayed here for a week of residency courses at Lamar University and this place was perfect.
Great little get away. Comfy bed. Hot shower. Full kitchen. Close to everything. Great outdoor space. Would stay here again.
Great property, very clean and comfortable.
They have a pool. Try it.

Great stay in a nice neighborhood. The pool house was perfect for our overnight stay while exploring Beaumont. Well stocked for our needs. Wish we could have arrived earlier to take a dip in the pool, which looked very refreshing. Great communication from our hosts. Would definitely recomend and return.
Great place to stay !! Very clean and cozy. Exactly how it looks in the pictures. Love the style and the decorations.
Comfortable home away from home Richard was great 👍 with his knowledge of the area
Richard's cottage was lovely and just a short distance to the historic downtown area. We didn't have the opportunity to use the swimming pool, but it was very nice.

It was just as pictured, the home was FULLY loaded. There was everything you needed for a long stay, the bed was comfortable, the pool was gorgeous and you have the most handsome dog next door to say hi!!
A nice space in the heart of Beaumont! Would stay here again.
Charming cottage in cute neighborhood

Our idea for the weekend trip involved a cozy place to watch TV, a pool and somewhere to grill.
This place has more than that. The pool area has improved from what you see in the photo listing. It has a table and seating area with a fire pit.
Would definitely like to stay again if I'm back to Beaumont.

Such a great place to stay and convenient location! Just minutes from downtown. Comes with a kitchen and full bathroom, perfect for an extended stay. The hosts even open up their pool/laundry for guests. 10/10
great place to stay, the place was clean.
Amazing space with an amazing host. Serene spot in the middle of Beaumont. Highly recommend.

The old town pool cottage was a great little place. It was perfect for our needs.
The neighborhood is awesome and centrally located for all we did.
The pool was fabulous, we loved it.
We would definitely stay here again if we are in the area.
Great place to stay!!
Lovely garage apartment in historic Beaumont with use of the pool. What more could you ask for!?! We had an awesome stay and will be back!
I enjoyed my stay. Would recommend.
Everything was amazing, couldn't ask for better A++
quiet step back in time in a historic part of Beaumont. Perfect for 1-2 guests. Much more room than other “pool houses” that I’ve stayed in. Hosts are very attentive.
An absolute gem- Loved my stay here! The hosts were super responsive and kind. I felt safe and comfortable the entire time. The apartment was so cozy and I loved the character of the whole place!
Such a great place to spend time. The hosts are the top of the line. Looking forward to our next stay next month.
Dry clean. Lots of amenities. Good location.
The apartment is so quaint and clean!
Always a great place.
This was a gem. Clean, stocked with basics, private and lots of hot water. It was cold outside during our visit but cozy inside. Would love to try the salt pool on a future stay!
Loved our stay while passing though on a road trip! Place was clean and cozy, would definitely stay again!

This is set up really cute in there back yard above a unused garage. Wish the weather would have been warmer and I’d had time to swim in the pool. FYI: There is a washer/dryer in the garage. I’d done some laundry if I’d known. It’s a very nice neighborhood and I’d recommend this place

Richard and his wife were very communicative, and answered any questions we had. They were very nice. The Air BNB was very clean and tidy and just very welcoming for both my (now) husband and his grooms. The BNB is located in a nice quiet neighborhood. The stay was just very welcoming in general. Would def recommend if you are around the area! It’s super home-y, and just gives a cute little tiny house vibe!
very nice room and kitchen
I thought the place was nice and cozy! Hoping if I come back for work I’m able to book and stay the whole duration
This is a nice, clean cozy place. I really enjoyed it. The host made everything very easy.
This cottage was perfection!! Sure perfection ❤️❤️
Loved the cottage. Great location, great space, and great amenities. Very pretty neighborhood. Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again.
Enjoyed my second stay with them and would definitely stay here again should I find myself back in the area!
What a gem in the heart of Beaumont! Located between downtown and close to the west end. It’s tucked away so it’s private, great kitchen space and quaint living/sleeping area.
Great location, very spacious, and everything was very clean. Pool looked awesome but it was raining. Thank you for having me
Nice neat clean place to stay. This was my 2nd stay here and both were great.
Enjoyed my stay! Great price and very cozy

Cozy, homey, and just right.
The stay:
I really had a great time at the cottage with my one-year old. This was more than a regular hotel stay—this was a cozy and private stay with the amenities such as a kitchen to give a tiny-home feel.
On my second night, my sister and her boys visited. We all gathered around the fire pit, located under the string-lit sitting area. THIS was THE highlight.
I made a quick stop at the grocery store and bought items for s’mores. We all gathered together and enjoyed pizza, pasta, sodas, hot cocoa and s’mores.
Fire Pit: After messaging a request to use the fire pit, Richard responded and came by within five minutes. He was kind enough to light it and provide skewers to use.
iPhone and Android charging cables:
I forgot to pack mine. Richard provided both charging cables to use.
Pool: pretty, but due to the cold weather, decided not to enjoy this offered amenity
Upper Deck: nice for stargazing, chit-chat, and morning coffee
great space and excellent host!
Great place!
Excellent, affordable, option in a charming neighborhood. Would definitely stay again!

This is my second time staying at the pool house. It is a charming place to stay. The bed is very comfortable. The kitchen is great, and the balcony is awesome as well. The location is good also. Great value for a comfy stay.
5 stars. Excellent place, no one bothered me. I was able to handle my business in town with a great place to sleep.
Well equipped and cozy place.

Super nice place, plenty of room, clean. Really liked the kitchen and the front porch. Self check-in made it convenient.
I only stayed one night on my way to New Orleans but would definitely come again!
It was a quaint place to stay and in a terrific location!

This place is seriously a little piece of heaven. The description is extremely accurate and the owners are very responsive in communication. My only regret is we didn’t get to use the pool, but I say next time for sure! You cannot go wrong enjoying this “live like a local” experience.

Do yourself a favor & stay at the Pool Cottage. The cottage is so clean & cozy! I wasn’t bothered with any type of noises. Very comfortable bed & soft, clean linens.
Nice kitchen with some basic supplies.
Very nice neighborhood. I look forward to staying again in the future instead of any hotel in the area. I’m sure the pool & outdoor deck are delightful in the summer. Richard & his wife are very responsive in communication as well. Definitely deserving of its high 5 star reviews.
Great place!!!
We will be back! Love it here
Wonderful place, very quiet.

Comfortable, kitchen fully equipped, slept well, sofa bed was perfect for one of my Grandsons. Beautiful setting with deck and pool. Too cold right now but nice walking neighborhood. Me and my 2 Grandsons enjoyed our stay. Would recommend to anyone.

Professionell and friendly hosting in a well equiped accommodation.
Beautiful historic neighbourhood.

Super clean and comfortable apartment in the historic neighborhood of Beaumont (although you do need to drive to get to any restaurant for dinner). Richard responded to communication quickly. Multiple free streaming TV services too.

We enjoyed our stay in Richard’s apartment very much. The space was private, comfortable, and very well equipped. The deck was a great place to enjoy being outdoors. The historic character of the apartment added some extra interest for us. We would definitely like to stay there again.
This was our first Airbnb experience, so let me say the bar has been set high! 😊 The location was perfect, bed was comfy, kitchen area was great, host was responsive. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

The place was perfect! It was clean and comfortable. There were plenty of amenities at your disposal.
The communication of the hosts was quick! Loved everything about it!
Wonderful place
Really clean and nice place to stay at. The studio was really well equipped and had a great view of the pool. Would stay again!

Great little place! Has everything you need. It was great that there was a little kitchen. The only minor complaint would be the noise of the train when you’re trying to sleep. The host does provide earplugs but I had to put in my headphones because the earplugs weren’t cutting it. I’m also a light sleeper, so that doesn’t help. Besides that, the stay was great!
This is a great guest house to stay. Clean and comfy. We only stayed 2 nights, but if we come back through this area we'll definitely be staying again.
Great stay...cozy, clean, comfortable and right of the highway to take a break and get back on. Great communication from Richard!
Location is in a very quiet neighborhood! Excellent place, including all that it has to offer at such close proximity to downtown! Will be sure to book again in the future.
Great!!!
The mattress was so uncomfortable that I wasn't able to sleep on it by the 2nd night. A good night sleep is key when you stay away from home.

The location is great! Everything you need is nearby, but the neighborhood is great as well. Great deck to enjoy the morning or late afternoon with the family. The place was nice and clean, had all the necessary items. Very well recommended.
Only used the place for an overnight stay, but enjoyed the place, reading its history and bed was comfortable. Didn’t get to enjoy it as much as we wanted.
Richard’s place was clean, location was great. I enjoyed my stay. Will definitely book again
Great place to stay, location is close to many restaurants and the interstate. The cottage was perfect for my trip.
Comfy, cozy 2nd story pool house cottage in the heart of a charming Cajun town. Nothing fancy but everything you need. Next time we’ll stay longer.
This is in a great location. It is compact, offers off the street parking. It is a pleasant walk to Rao's bakery from here.
Great spot in historic neighborhood. Excellent value compared to Beaumont area hotels. Wish we'd had more time to swim!
Centrally located. Wonderfully designed cabin. Elegant, clean, quiet. The hosts made it super easy to check in. I hope I can stay here again on my next visit.
This is a perfect spot to stay if you want to be alone. Super nice little spot. Would have loved to use the pool if it wasn’t for getting home late and leaving early for work.
Cute, comfortable, and clean little place.
Everything was nice, I will definitely be back when I’m working in this area again! Hopefully its available!
Great location, great value. The pool was very nice. Everything was great.

Convenient location to I-10. Perfect for passing through town! The guest house is a very private space for being so close to the main house and we loved being able to access the pool. The bed is a little small for two but perfect for a solo-traveler.
Richard is great at communicating and was very professional!
Great place close to St. Elizabeth Hospital.
Great place! Well stocked kitchen. Friendly hosts! Close to stores restaurants, & museums. Restaurant suggestions were great! Great value in a safe area!
Great place in a great location! The charming historical apartment with pool access was just what we needed for a quick trip. Very clean and had everything you would need. Highly recommend!!

The Pool House is a charming slice of Beaumont history hiding beside an exquisite pool. Nestled at the back of the property, with one wall covered with greenery, it’s a private oasis with comfort in mind.
I arrived well after dark and, as promised, the area was very well lit and I was easily able to find my way to the stairs for the unit.
The kitchen boasts full-size appliances, assorted cookware and is stocked with a variety of spices and condiments for your use.
A few beach towels are stored above the fridge for use by the pool, which is absolutely beautiful and I am devastated that I didn’t have time to take a swim.
Maybe next time!

The space was perfectly as described and very clean. We loved learning about the historical nature of the home, and got to see more history through the neighborhood as we walked to a nearby breakfast spot. Richard thought of everything to make our stay comfortable!
Great central location in historic neighborhood. Very clean apartment and great value for entire apartment.
Great value & great hosts! Frequently stay here because of these things. Hope to stay here again & again when I visit family!

Such a beautiful oasis! Beautiful interior design, and a comfortable space to nestle in. Felt very welcomed and enjoyed the offerings of this lovely experience! If in Beaumont, or traveling between Texas & Louisiana definitely stay at this place!!

This was my first time using AirBnB and I was kind of nervous. It was a big difference staying here compared to staying at the Hilton but it was honestly the best experience me and my husband could have shared. It was so nice to be able to just relax and forget about our normal life.
This place is great. It was spotless and comfortable.
There were some dogs barking and a adolescent rooster trying to crow (very funny) close by. It was not constant. I live in the country so if felt like home to me.
A lovely secluded spot in the historic district with the added bonus of a pool!
Very cozy and super clean. Close to every thing. The pool was amazing and a highlight. Hosts are super nice and very responsive.

This place is great and was welcomingfrom day 1! it'sthe littlethings that make it great and the pool is amazing.
one of our biggest jokes during our stay was a neighbors rooster, not sure if he was young or a chicken acting like a rooster but it doesn'tknow how to crow lol.
It was clean and comfortable and the owners are so kind and hospital. We highly recommend. 😊
Clean, prompt to reply to messages and perfect place for my girls and me while visiting family in the area. The girls loved having the pool to use.
Great place in a nice neighborhood. Owners very responsive when questions came up. And the pool was awesome on those hot Texas evenings!
Very cool place. Guest pool house in the backyard. Beaumont is a very strange place but at least this Airbnb was nice.

Nothing but 5 stars. My husband and I loved the space. It was just perfect for the wedding we were attending down the road. Richard was prompt to reply to all messages, check in was a breeze, the space was clean, and my husband and I enjoyed our weekend away.
Cute little night's stay.
Nice setting in an older neighborhood. We enjoyed a late afternoon walk to admire the homes. The unit was very clean and neat.
We enjoyed our stay at Richard’s place, though it was brief. There was everything we needed there, he clearly keeps it up well, and it’s in a great neighborhood. You won’t regret staying there!

Richard's place is very clean and comfortable. The amenities were great, had everything i needed. Although i did not get a chance to use the pool since it was raining during my stay. It was a nice addition to be able to have access to it. Overall, i really enjoyed by stay and would recommend this cottage on your next stay in Beaumont.

This was a great experience for our family.
The accommodations were great.
We had everything that we needed.

This was a perfect place to stay for couples or even if your traveling alone. Safe & easy access to all areas in Beaumont. This place has everything kitchen, bed, couch, bathroom, & pool. The pool was a nice place to relax & wind down. Will stay here again!
The unit was sufficient for what I required regarding my stay in Beaumont. I would rent the unit again if my profession required me to return to Beaumont. No complaints.

Such a friendly and wonderful host! Looked just like the pictures very clean lots of towels and linens!
Beautiful little home felt just like a home away from home!
10/10 recommend and would stay again in a heart beat!
Definitely would book again, Host was great.
We had a great time! The space was perfect for our family in town for a special event. Would definitely stay here again.
Such an enjoyable space to be in! We love the flavor of the decor. Kitchen had all the supplies we needed and beds were comfy. Would stay again.

Ramona is lovely. However, their place needs maintenance badly. The garage is gross and dirty and had holes in the walls. The refrigerator has a smell as well as the freezer. The main bedroom bed frame is literally falling apart. There is a hole in the garage which allows loads of hot air up in the main bedroom closet and affects the inside temperature. The water pressure is very low. All of the bathrooms needs the caulking removed and replaced and basic maintenance. The main bathroom upstairs toilet wobbles. The powder room downstairs door doesn’t stay shut or lock easily.
Awesome house, beautifully decorated!
Very cool place to stay!
We enjoyed our visit we love the patio area and cooking out on the grill very comfortable beds beautiful decorated house and and larger room

We were extremely happy with this place. We felt at home, loved all the artwork & books and feel of the place. The beds & pillows were comfy. The home provided everything we needed !! Ramona & Andy were super to deal with and even let us buy some of their personal artwork to take home to California where we will continue to enjoy their charm & serve as a reminder of our lovely trip to visit family in Texas. Southern hospitality at its finest !!

Comfortable & cozy stay with a unique flavor. We really enjoyed the decor and the vibe it gives to the house. There was plenty of room for our family of 5. We ate dinner together at the table and spent time surfing the various streaming services that were provided. The neighborhood was quiet. Everything we needed was with a 5-15 minute drive. Ramona was very responsive and a great host. We would stay here again.
Ramona's place is great! Highly recommended.

Aloha from Hawaii 🤙
Traveled to Beaumont to visit family and friends, we're so satisfied for booking with Ramona at her artful abode- felt like home away from home. Her hospitality and quick responses to inquiries made for peace of mind, the cozy, eclectic atmosphere provided us a sense of place in an otherwise uneventful town.
Happy was my wife and happy was my life, for deciding to stay here.
Mahalo nui Loa, much Kokua and Aloha from our Ohana to yours.
The Green's ❤️
Loved it .

I can't say enough about this beautiful condo. It had everything you needed as if you were at home. The home was very clean and beds were very comfortable. I fell in love with this place and didn't want to leave. I highly recommend if you are in Beaumont Tx. book this beautiful and clean Condo.
Such a Beautiful Spot. The Art Work in the home is Amazing. Keep your car doors locked though. Definitely worth stopping by ... one of the best decorated homes I've stayed in.

The Artful Abode is a step into a retro art gallery. Amazing quaint feel, beautifully decorated, well appointed.
The beds were comfortable and kitchen well equipped.
We’d definitely stay here again.
Hidden gem . Amazing art work
